name: Bullock-Cart Workers Development Association
briefDescription: Bullock-cart Workers Development Association (BWDA) a service organization started on 2nd October, 1985, is committed to the sustainable development of unorganized workers, women, children and animal welfare in the state of Tamil Nadu and Union Territories of Pondicherry and Andaman & Nicobar Islands with Head Office at Villupuram.  BWDA implementing many program which include development activities for bullock-cart workers and women, vocational training, entrepreneur development program, lending under micro finance program, community development, health and family counseling, education, relief and rehabilitation.
